channel.title: #ScreenshotSaturday on David Amador
channel.description: Recent content in #ScreenshotSaturday on David Amador

item.title: Scripting week
item.description: This week I’ve been working on replacing my current scripting system. It worked great for Vizati but I need something with a little more flexibility. Instead of explaining what I’ve managed to get working I’ve made a screenshot with some notes. I think I’m going to make this my #ScreenshotSaturday
item.content:encoded:
This week I’ve been working on replacing my current scripting system. It worked great for Vizati but I need something with a little more flexibility.

Instead of explaining what I’ve managed to get working I’ve made a screenshot with some notes.

I think I’m going to make this my #ScreenshotSaturday
